metadata.name: ItemUserPermissions
metadata.short-description: The owning user permissions of an item
metadata.discussion:
ItemUserPermissions objects describe the owning user of an Item, and their permissions on the item.
To access this object, use the user property of the associated Item.
metadata.related: For group permissions, use <df-class>ItemGroupPermissions</df-class>. For world permissions, use <df-class>ItemOtherPermissions</df-class>.
